item.title: Recommendation Engine
item.description: Today in the world of personalized marketing, it is important to understand each customer and target them accordingly. The task of analyzing customer behaviour from humongous data is a challenging one and this project attempts to recommend books to users based on their given ratings of other books. The dataset used is Goodreads book rating data.
